thread.title: Watch video: Shilpa Shetty's son Viaan gives the cutest 'Oscar speech'
thread.title_full: Watch video: Shilpa Shetty's son Viaan gives the cutest 'Oscar speech' - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Watch video: Shilpa Shetty's son Viaan gives the cutest 'Oscar speech'
text:
(Inset) Raj Kundra with wife Shilpa Shetty and son Viaan 
While the world was glued to the idiot box watching the 89th Academy Awards, Shilpa Shetty's son Viaan Kundra decided to come up with an acceptance speech.
Daddy Raj Kundra uploaded the video on Instagram in which the four-year-old, with a trophy in hand, says, "It is a very nice time. I had won this trophy and I want to give this to my mum and dad, so let me give it (sic)."
WATCH VIDEO: 
  My son preparing for his oscar speech for #oscars2017 weekend @officialshilpashetty has really rubbed off on him haha missing you xx #dubailand 
A post shared by Raj Kundra (@rajkundra9) onFeb 25, 2017 at 7:45am PST
